Class Button

Prop
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.model.Button
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoorButton, LaserButton
public class Button extends Prop
Represents a generic button prop that can be pressed or released. Buttons can optionally be linked to a Door for testing or gameplay, allowing the button to open or close the door when interacted with.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Button(String spritesheetName)
    Constructs a new Button using the specified spritesheet name.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected IEntityAnimationController<?>
    createAnimationController()
    Creates the animation controller responsible for this button's visual behavior.
    void
    pressButton()
    Presses the button, disables its collision, and opens the linked door if one is set.
    boolean
    pressed()
    Returns whether the button is currently pressed.
    void
    releaseButton()
    Releases the button and closes the linked door if present.
    void

    Links this button to a door, typically for unit testing.

  • Constructor Details

    • Button

      public Button(String spritesheetName)
      Constructs a new Button using the specified spritesheet name.
      Parameters:
      spritesheetName - the name of the spritesheet for this button

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the button each tick. When pressed, the button disables its collision.

    • setLinkedDoor

      public void setLinkedDoor(Door door)
      Links this button to a door, typically for unit testing.
      Parameters:
      door - the door to associate with this button

    • pressButton

      public void pressButton()
      Presses the button, disables its collision, and opens the linked door if one is set.

    • releaseButton

      public void releaseButton()
      Releases the button and closes the linked door if present. (Used primarily for unit tests.)

    • pressed

      public boolean pressed()
      Returns whether the button is currently pressed.
      Returns:
      true if pressed, otherwise false

    • createAnimationController

      protected IEntityAnimationController<?> createAnimationController()
      Creates the animation controller responsible for this button's visual behavior.
      Returns:
      a new ButtonAnimationController instance
